With 100 staff members<ref>{{cite news |url=http://www.adam.com.au/nImages/clockingupthehours.pdf |title=Clocking up the hours. |publisher=The Advertiser, South Australia |last=Tredrea |first=Alexandra |date=January 02, 2008}}</ref> and a customer base of 75,000+<ref>{{cite news |url=http://www.adam.com.au/nImages/censoringwebaccess.pdf |title=Censoring web access too hard. |publisher=The Advertiser, South Australia |last=Changarathil |first=Valerina |date=January 05, 2008}}</ref>, Adam Internet holds 35% of South Australia's Internet Market. <ref>{{cite news |url=http://www.edugeek.net.au/imgdump/02jun2007.png |title=Internet business online for growth |publisher=The Advertiser, South Australia |last=Austin |first=Nigel |date=June 02, 2007}}</ref>
With 100 staff members<ref>{{cite news |url=http://www.adam.com.au/nImages/clockingupthehours.pdf |title=Clocking up the hours. |publisher=The Advertiser, South Australia |last=Tredrea |first=Alexandra |date=January 02, 2008}}</ref> and a customer base of 75,000+<ref>{{cite news |url=http://www.adam.com.au/nImages/censoringwebaccess.pdf |title=Censoring web access too hard. |publisher=The Advertiser, South Australia |last=Changarathil |first=Valerina |date=January 05, 2008}}</ref>, Adam Internet holds 35% of South Australia's Internet Market. <ref>{{cite news |url=http://www.edugeek.net.au/imgdump/02jun2007.png |title=Internet business online for growth |publisher=The Advertiser, South Australia |last=Austin |first=Nigel |date=June 02, 2007}}</ref>

Adam also runs a host of gaming and file servers; its gaming network [[GamingSA]] is one of the largest in the state. [[FileArena]] - Adam's file mirror; hosts a variety of files including mirrors for several large [[Linux]] distributions such as [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]], [[SUSE Linux|Suse]] and [[Fedora Core|Fedora]], as well as a [[Tucows]] Mirror.
+
Adam also runs a host of gaming and file servers; its gaming network [[GamingSA]] is one of the largest in the state. [[FileArena]] - Adam's file mirror; hosts a variety of files including mirrors for several large [[Linux]] distributions such as [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]], [[SUSE Linux|Suse]] and [[Fedora Core|Fedora]], as well as a [[Tucows]] Mirror.
